channel.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
channel.description:
Just got this game today and having a hell of a time selotaping power tools together. Anyone know any good combinations?
So far I have found:
I.E.D. (propane canister and box of nails) Defiler (fire axe and sledgehammer) Rocket Launcher (fireworks and lead pipe) Paddesaw (padde and chainsaw) Auger (drill motor and pitchfork) Exsanguinator (vacuum and sawblade)

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
I also have a few combinations i would like mentioned.
Wheelchair + Battery = Electric Chair
Wheelchair + Lawnmower = Uhm, Wheelchair cutting zombies apart?
Diamonds + Flashlight = Awesome light saber

And one of my favorites: Plates + Cement Saw = Really deadly launcher, especially when there’s a lot of zombies. It can also give you A LOT of xp, and it shoots very far.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Actually, fireworks + many thing would be fun. Chainsaw + Fireworks = Randomly spinning mess of death.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
That was a complete typo, oppps, my mistake. I meant to type Dead Rising 2, I own Left 4 Dead 2 and had it on my mind.

I played the first DR and am looking forward to the combo weapons in DR2. I agree tho, some kind of firework/rocket powered wheelchair would be sweet.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

I havent played left for dead 2 yet, but i would imagine wheelchair + fireworks would eventually equal exploding wheelchair.

In Dead Rising, Fireworks = Rockets. Also, I’d like you to note the Dead Rising part of that statement.

Read full topic

item.description:
rorriMAesU:

I havent played left for dead 2 yet, but i would imagine wheelchair + fireworks would eventually equal exploding wheelchair.

Rockets on the other hand, that would be sweet. Rocket wheelchair ftw.

but this is dead rising 2… l4d 2 doesn’t have cool combinations lol

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
I recently confirmed the pipe + fireworks as god tier. It can’t be stored in you inventory, but its 75 rockets can kill a hell of a lot of zombies.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Piece of Meat+Dynamite= Dyno-meat

Holy Hell! IT IS FUUUUUUNNNN!!!

You can find dynamite at the construction zones around the area. Just combine 'em and have fun. Works like regular meat, but BETTER

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons

item.description:
I just discovered the leafblower + umbrella combo. Good times! Although not particularly practical.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Pitchfork + Shotgun yields the highest-PP weapon in the game, and a great Evil Dead reference. You can only use its supreme attack if you actually earn the combo card (as opposed to just getting it by combining the weapons)

Read full topic

item.description:
Machete + Broom is good, but I haven’t seen many machetes lying around.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Electric Guitar + Amp makes a soundwave-blasting guitar that blows up enemy’s heads.
One of my favorites is the boombow; dynamite + bow gives you ten shots, about as useful as a high-explosive rocket launcher. And unlike the launcher you mentioned, you can carry it around.

Also, Spear + Drill makes for a very fast weapon that’s good for taking down plenty of bosses.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
+1 to boxing gloves and bowie knife. also there’s a push broom and some other knife combination, don’t remember exactly what, but that also worked very well

and of course, the good ol’ bat and nail combo. every time you leave the safe house you have enough materials before entering the mall to make two bat and nail combos

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2 combo weapons
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Drill buckets nice, only because its a drill bucket, not because its useful. I personally love the boxing gloves + bowie knife combo. Its fast and really deadly.

Read full topic
